quote: You're thirsty not hungry. Go and drink a glass of water!
Body transformation takes time. Don't f*cking give up easily!
If you keep good food in your fridge, you will eat good food.
It takes five minutes to consume 500 calories. It takes two hours to burn them off.
It's not possible to lose weight without diet. Don't fool yourself!
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Eat your food slowly, it takes approximately 4 minutes for the brain to send a signal to the brain that there is food in your stomach.
Avoid sugary drinks, sugar is the main source for the fats in your body.
Eating healthy food fills your body with energy and nutrients. Imagine your cells smiling back at you and saying: “Thank you!
What you eat literally becomes you. you have a choice in what you’re made of
